import React, { useState } from 'react' const Recipe = ({profile}) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [ingredients, setIngredients] = useState(""); const [directions, setDirections]= useState(""); const formSubmit =e=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(title, ingredients, directions) } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setIngredients(e.target.value)}/>
setDirections(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Recipe
